TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1322
TEI.2.document_title: John Roe to Stephen F. Austin, 05-05-1826

barker_notes.barker_summary: John Roe to Austin, May 5, 1826. Order for sum due for services with Indians.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1322

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*John Roe to Austin, May 5, 1826. Order for sum due for services with Indians.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**date_mentioned n="05-05-1826">May 5th 1826*/date_mentioned**/p**p* *person_mentioned*Colonel Stevan F. Austin */person_mentioned* Please Pay The *person_mentioned*bearer */person_mentioned**person_mentioned*Joshua Parker*/person_mentioned* the Sum Due me for bringing in the*person_mentioned* tonkaway Indians */person_mentioned*and oblige yours*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*John Roe */person_mentioned* [Rubric]*/p*
*p*[On reverse] Recd of *person_mentioned*S. F. Austin */person_mentioned*twenty dollars on the within order*/p* *p**location_mentioned*San Felipe de Austin */location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="05-10-1826">May 10. 1826*/date_mentioned**/p* *p**person_mentioned*Joshua Parker [Rubric]*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*[On Margin] Paid order for money for bringing in the *person_mentioned*Tonkaways*/person_mentioned*.*/p*
*/div1*
